mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, b.user_code, b.name AS user_name, a.coin_num, a.create_time, (SELECT c.name FROM tb_user c WHERE c.user_id = a.oper_user_id) AS oper_user_name, a.file_info FROM coin_track a JOIN tb_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` AND b.state=1 AND b.bus_state=1 WHERE a.`coin_type` = 2 AND a.`create_type` = 4
and b.user_code = #{user_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.create_time >= str_to_date(#{start_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.create_time <= str_to_date(#{end_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by a.create_time desc

SELECT t.create_time,t.gg_fee,t.fd_fee,t.re_fee,(t.gg_fee+t.fd_fee-t.re_fee) act_fee FROM ( SELECT (SELECT MAX(create_time) FROM coin_track t WHERE a.order_id = t.order_id) create_time, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(coin_num),0) FROM coin_track g WHERE a.order_id = g.order_id AND g.create_type='1') gg_fee, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(coin_num),0) FROM coin_track f WHERE a.order_id = f.order_id AND f.create_type='2') fd_fee, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(coin_num),0) FROM coin_track r WHERE a.order_id = r.order_id AND r.create_type='8') re_fee FROM coin_track a JOIN tb_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` AND b.`state` = 1 AND b.`bus_state` = 1 WHERE a.coin_type IN(1,3) AND a.coin_num>0 AND a.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.order_id ORDER BY a.`order_id` DESC) t

SELECT a.create_time, a.coin_num, CASE a.create_type WHEN 1 THEN '广告费' WHEN 2 THEN '辅导奖' WHEN 3 THEN '提现' WHEN 6 THEN '转电子币' END AS create_type_name FROM coin_track a JOIN tb_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` AND b.state=1 AND b.bus_state=1 WHERE a.`coin_type` = 1 AND a.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.`create_time` DESC

SELECT a.create_time, a.coin_num, CASE a.create_type WHEN 4 THEN '充值' WHEN 5 THEN '互转' WHEN 6 THEN '转电子币' WHEN 7 THEN '购物' WHEN 9 THEN '报单' END AS create_type_name, a.comments FROM coin_track a JOIN tb_user b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` AND b.state=1 AND b.bus_state=1 WHERE a.`coin_type` = 2 AND a.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.`create_time` DESC

select IFNULL(bonusact_sum,0) as bonusActSum, IFNULL(reconsmpact_sum,0) as reconsmpActSum, (IFNULL(bonusact_sum,0)-IFNULL(reconsmpact_sum,0)) AS actSum from accout_info where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
